function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person transmission and rapid spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing efficient air filtration systems and ventilation in residential, commercial, and hospital environments","Technologies":"Inline filtration media, Minimum Efficiency Reporting Value (MERV) filters, High-Efficiency Particulate Air (HEPA) filters","People":"Residents, employees, patients, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, healthcare facility managers, HVAC system operators"}]}
